info.headline: Tornado Warning issued July 11 at 5:47PM CDT until July 11 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
info.description:
TORMKX
The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Lafayette County in south central Wisconsin... Southwestern Green County in south central Wisconsin...
* Until 630 PM CDT.
* At 547 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage were located near Winslow, or 11 miles southwest of Monroe, moving northeast at 35 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Monroe, Monticello, Argyle, South Wayne, Browntown, Juda, and Jordan Center.
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 6:30 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 6:30 PM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 6:30 PM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 6:30 PM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
